com.cube.storm.ui.view.holder

Class Holder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.ui.view.holder.Holder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedImageListItemHolder, AppCollectionItemHolder, ButtonListItemHolder, CheckableListItemHolder, CollectionListItemHolder, DescriptionListItemHolder, DividerHolder, HeaderListItemHolder, ImageListItemHolder, ListFooterHolder, ListHeaderHolder, LogoListItemHolder, OrderedListItemHolder, SpotlightImageListItemHolder, StandardListItemHolder, TextListItemHolder, TitleListItemHolder, ToggleableListItemHolder, UnorderedListItemHolder, VideoListItemHolder

    public abstract class Holder<T>
extends Object
    Holder class which is used for populating the list. This class should be treated like any other view holder, and should keep references of the views it needs to popuate within the class, and referenced in populateView(Object)

      • createView

        public abstract View createView(ViewGroup parent)
        Method called when a new view needs to be created in the adapter.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent view. Use this with LayoutInflater to inflate your view
        Returns:
        The created view

      • populateView

        public abstract void populateView(T model)
        Called when the view needs to be populated
        Parameters:
        model - The model to populate the view with
